title: Fast Link Recovery via PTP-synchronized Nanosecond Optical Switching
authors:
V. Yokar, A. Mehrpooya, Y. Teng, S. Shen, Z. Wu, K. Bardhi, S. Yan, D.
  Simeonidou
abstract:
This paper proposes and validates a PTP-synchronized 8.4ns optical switching
with a 100ns jitter at the switching edges. This approach is adopted and
demonstrated for instant network recovery within 2.7ms and scheduled network
recovery.
subjects: Electrical Engineering and Systems Science/Systems and Control
